alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 5:05PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Cheyenne and eastern Kimball Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 405 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Potter, or 16 miles west of Sidney, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Potter, Lorenzo and Brownson. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 36 and 54. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
